subSections.title: Alternative forms
subSections.text: Note that in Japanese {{w|shinjitai}}, the bottom component is [[大]] and not [[犬]].

subSections.title: Compounds
Usage notes
subSections.text: A CJK {{w|CJK compatibility ideographs|compatibility ideograph}} (U+FA55) exists for the {{w|kyūjitai}} form of {{lang|ja|突}}.

subSections.title: Hanja
subSections.text:
{{ko-hanja|hangeul=돌|eumhun=|rv=dol|mr=tol|y=tol}}

# [[dash]], [[clash]], eg., [[돌격]], [[돌진]], [[충돌]]
# [[protrusion]], eg., [[돌기]], [[돌출]]
# [[flue]], [[chimney]], eg., [[온돌]], [[연돌]]
# [[penetration]], [[piercing]], eg., [[돌파]], [[연돌]]
# [[fierce]] [[horse]], eg., perhaps [[돌궐]]
# [[sudden]], eg., [[돌발]], [[돌변]], [[돌연]], [[돌풍]]
